entities.name: department
entities.description: The department is mentioned as the entity that Winky will be taken to for questioning. (Excerpt: 'department for questioning')

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The ministry is mentioned as an important part of the government, and Mr. Crouch's position within it. (Excerpt: 'such an important member of the Ministry')

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is a house-elf who has disobeyed Mr. Crouch and will be punished as a result. (Excerpt: 'Winky stammered, looking up at Mr. Crouch')

entities.name: mr crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is an important member of the Ministry who has authority over Winky and will be punishing her for disobeying him. (Excerpt: 'Mr. Crouch was such an important member of the Ministry')

entities.name: mr diggory
entities.description: Mr. Diggory is a person who does not think much of Mr. Crouch's suggestion to deal with Winky himself. (Excerpt: 'Mr. Diggory looked as though he didn’t think much of this suggestion at all')

relationships.description: Mr. Crouch has authority over Winky and will be punishing her for disobeying him. (Excerpt: 'I told her to remain in the tent... And I find that she disobeyed me')
Mr. Crouch is an important member of the Ministry, which suggests he has a relationship with the department. (Excerpt: 'such an important member of the Ministry')
Winky is subordinate to Mr. Crouch and will be punished for disobeying him. (Excerpt: 'M-m-master . . .’ Winky stammered, looking up at Mr. Crouch')
